availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Harrodsburg, Kentucky, livery keeper. Kentucky native. Son of John Ruply and Mary Jane Ruply. Married to Rachel A. Ruply. Father of James Ruply. Resident in Harrodsburg in 1850. Livery keeper in Harrodsburg in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, Harrodsburg District 2, p. 363A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, Harrodsburg, p. 11.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyle County, Precinct 1, p. 9.
Find A Grave, "Sam Rupley (1840-1876)," Memorial #27290627, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/27290627# (accessed August 24, 2018).
